医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
改用电子烟可能会缓解呼吸道症状，为吸烟者带来希望该研究表明，电子烟可能会减轻与吸烟相关的呼吸道症状，但进一步的研究对于了解长期影响至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Switching-to-e-香烟-may-ease-respiratory-symptoms-offering-hope-for-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Switching-to-e-香烟-may-ease-respiratory-symptoms-offering-hope-for-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0229d89-853b-4ac6-9e4d-5c4f281484ce Fri, 03 Jan 2025 05:15:00 -0500 Switching to e-cigarettes may ease respiratory symptoms, offering hope for smokers
Twigstats 揭示了欧洲从铁器时代到维京时代的隐秘祖先转变Twigstats 揭示了欧洲的古代迁徙，增强了基因组分析，并以前所未有的精度揭示了从公元前 500 年到公元 1000 年的基因转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Twigstats-unveils-Europee28099s-hidden-ancestral-shifts-from-Iron-Age-to-Viking-era.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Twigstats-unveils-Europee28099s-hidden-ancestral-shifts-from-Iron-Age-to-Viking-era.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af66a924-8e08-42a1-8657-cc2472f4e59b Fri, 03 Jan 2025 04:27:00 -0500 Twigstats unveils Europe’s hidden ancestral shifts from Iron Age to Viking era
子宫内膜异位症的新血液检测澳大利亚研究人员开发出新的测试来诊断影响九分之一澳大利亚妇女和女孩的衰弱状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/A-new-blood-test-for-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/A-new-blood-test-for-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d68848a5-6826-4890-a2a0-dde6b3e23e8f Fri, 03 Jan 2025 04:10:00 -0500 A new blood test for endometriosis
尼古丁可以改善艾滋病毒感染者的认知功能和炎症吗？研究表明，吸烟可以通过降低大脑炎症来改善艾滋病毒阳性个体的认知控制，这凸显了尼古丁的潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Can-nicotine-improve-cognitive-function-and-inflammation-in-people-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/Can-nicotine-improve-cognitive-function-and-inflammation-in-people-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eda1e140-933f-4ad6-ba4f-7e05d17f6f65 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 03:41:00 -0500 Can nicotine improve cognitive function and inflammation in people with HIV?
新年，新的减肥方法：近四分之三的英国女性正在考虑在 2025 年使用 GLP-1 2024年即将结束，新的一年迎来了为未来一年设定新目标的机会。虽然减肥和健身是新年决心的主要内容，但众所周知，它们是不可持续的决心，不会持续到一月份。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-Year-new-approach-to-weight-loss-几乎-UK-women-are-considering-using-GLP- 1s-in-2025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250103/New-Year-new-approach-to-weight-loss-几乎-UK-women-are-considering-using-GLP- 1s-in-2025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6790ea02-bb16-4f81-adb8-a775e73bcac0 Fri, 03 Jan 2025 03:41:00 -0500 New Year, new approach to weight loss: Almost three quarters of UK women are considering using GLP-1s in 2025
揭示基因失活在人类疾病中的作用哥伦比亚大学研究人员的新工作彻底颠覆了教科书上的遗传学原理，并揭示了为什么一些携带致病基因的人没有出现任何症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Unveiling-the-role-of-gene-inactivation-in- human-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Unveiling-the-role-of-gene-inactivation-in- human-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8dcd83b-5d86-4845-8a2d-6175d7e86b6d Thu, 02 Jan 2025 23:53:28 -0500 Unveiling the role of gene inactivation in human disease
根据 T 细胞反应预测 H5N1 疾病严重程度拉霍亚免疫学研究所 (LJI) 科学家领导的一项新研究表明，许多人已经拥有免疫细胞“待命”来对抗 H5N1 病毒（也称为高致病性禽流感）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Predicting-H5N1-disease-severity-based-on-T-cell-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Predicting-H5N1-disease-severity-based-on-T-cell-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc6a4ed3-c78d-4b68-b7da-e003a528c2cf Thu, 02 Jan 2025 23:48:01 -0500 Predicting H5N1 disease severity based on T cell responses
旋光测量追踪跟腱再生跟腱损伤很常见，但由于当前成像技术的限制，在恢复过程中监测起来很困难。清华大学深圳国际研究生院副教授曾楠带领的研究人员应用穆勒矩阵偏振法这种非侵入性成像方法来更准确地观察和评估跟腱损伤的愈合情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Polarimetry-tracks-Achilles-tendon-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Polarimetry-tracks-Achilles-tendon-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=273c2630-a6e1-43fb-8ac2-45deebbe3b77 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 23:42:19 -0500
研究通过多效性鉴定新的 IgAN 位点IgA 肾病 (IgAN) 是原发性肾小球肾炎的一种常见形式，其特征是 IgA 在肾小球系膜中沉积，导致一系列组织病理学病变和可变的临床病程，相当一部分患者可进展为终末期肾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-identizes-novel-IgAN-loci-through-pleiotropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-identizes-novel-IgAN-loci-through-pleiotropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6614a0fe-d94d-4598-b893-51535d6a0a5c Thu, 02 Jan 2025 23:37:31 -0500 Study identifies novel IgAN loci through pleiotropy
美国轻微禽流感病例引发家禽和乳制品行业安全警告研究人员在美国家禽和奶制品工人中发现了 46 例轻度甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病例，凸显了个人防护装备依从性低和潜在的爆发风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Mild-avian-flu-cases-in-US-spark-safety-warnings-for-poultry-and-dairy-sectors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Mild-avian-flu-cases-in-US-spark-safety-warnings-for-poultry-and-dairy-sectors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbe02e06-1fd4-4364-a236-da8f21b09c90 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 22:09:00 -0500 Mild avian flu cases in US spark safety warnings for poultry and dairy sectors
